oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Shotgun Boogie performance ; Red Hen Boogie performance
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance of Shotgun Boogie, written by Tennessee Ernie Ford, and performed by two unidentified male voices with guitar accompaniment. Performance of Red Hen Boogie, written by Ira Louvin and Charles Louvin, and performed by an unidentified bluesgrass band. Performance of I Don't Hurt Anymore, written by Don Robertson and Walter Rollins, and performed by Hank Snow.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) [Unidentified] performs "Shotgun Boogie" [incomplete] / (1:43) [Unidentified] performs "Red Hen Boogie" [incomplete] / (2:41) Hank Snow performs "I Don't Hurt Anymore" [incomplete]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Ford, Tennessee Ernie, 1919-1991; Louvin, Ira, 1924-1965; Louvin, Charlie, 1927-2011; Snow, Hank
